jobDescription: Business Intelligence Data Analyst with Microstrategy Report Writing Experience  My client is a premier online content network with the information and entertainment people crave. Brands dive deep into the things people care most about across entertainment, tech, news, business, and sports. This is a 2 month contract in SF and it could get extended.  Due to migrations to new tools including a new CMS (Content Management System), new ad serving platform, and new order management system, they need to rebuild existing Microstrategy projects, reports, and report containers.
